{"id":620501332,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1642280905,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/620501332/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Replace All ?'s to Avoid Consecutive Repeating Characters","memory":"39.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String modifyString(String s) {\n        char[] arr = s.toCharArray();\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            if (arr[i] == '?') {\n                for (arr[i] = 'a'; arr[i] <= 'c'; arr[i]++) {\n                    if ((i == 0 || (arr[i - 1] != arr[i])) && (i == s.length() - 1 || (arr[i + 1] != arr[i])))\n                        break;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return new String(arr);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"replace-all-s-to-avoid-consecutive-repeating-characters"}
